name: Hobgoblin Warlord
description: The Hobgoblin Warlord is a formidable warrior with a strong build and a commanding presence, usually equipped with a greatsword and javelin.
memorable: Its ability to inspire weaker allies and strike multiple times when bloodied makes it a key tactical leader on the battlefield.
goals: To lead troops in battle, making strategic decisions to turn the tide in favor of its side.
relations: Often accompanied by other goblinoids and military units, serving as an elite leader among hobgoblins.
environment: Typically found in military encampments, war zones, or strongholds of hobgoblins.
strengths: High melee capabilities with multiple attacks and the ability to motivate allies, making it a dangerous opponent.
weaknesses: Becomes vulnerable when bloodied, losing benefits tied to military training.
attacks: Uses a greatsword for powerful melee slashes and a javelin for ranged strikes.
most_powerful_ability: Bloodied Rage allows it to attack multiple times, striking fear into its enemies when in danger.
skills: Proficient in Athletics, Engineering, and Intimidation, showcasing combat readiness and tactical acumen.
additional_information: Possesses a high armor class and significant hit points.
Utilizes tactical movement to avoid opportunity attacks.
Can inspire lower challenge rating allies with Officers Command.
Advantage on tactical decision-making due to Military Training.
Can remove conditions while bloodied with Elite Recovery.
